title: Every set admits a group structure iff choice

blocks.name: unxpwdom3
blocks.content: Weaker version of ~ unxpwdom where a function is required only to be cancellative, not an injection. ` D ` and ` B ` are to be thought of as "large" "horizonal" sets, the others as "small". Because the operator is row-wise injective, but the whole row cannot inject into ` A ` , each row must hit an element of ` B ` ; by column injectivity, each row can be identified in at least one way by the ` B ` element that it hits and the column in which it is hit. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Jul-2015.) _MOVABLE_

blocks.name: pwfi2f1o
blocks.content: The ~ pw2f1o bijection relates finitely supported indicator functions on a two-element set to finite subsets. _MOVABLE_ (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Jul-2015.) (Revised by AV, 14-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm pwfi2f1o(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s1, c3, cima(ccnv(cv(s1)), csn(c1o))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  mpbid(wcel(c0, c1), wf1o(c2, c3, cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wf1o(cres(cmpt(s1, co(c2o, cmap, c0), cima(ccnv(cv(s1)), csn(c1o))), c3), c3, cima(cmpt(s1, co(c2o, cmap, c0), cima(ccnv(cv(s1)), csn(c1o))), c3)))

  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wf1(cmpt(s1, co(c2o, cmap, c0), cima(ccnv(cv(s1)), csn(c1o))), co(c2o, cmap, c0), cpw(c0)), wf1o(cmpt(s1, co(c2o, cmap, c0), cima(ccnv(cv(s1)), csn(c1o))), co(c2o, cmap, c0), cpw(c0)))

blocks.name: pwfi2en
blocks.content: Finitely supported indicator functions are equinumerous to finite subsets. _MOVABLE_ (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Jul-2015.) (Revised by AV, 14-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm pwfi2en(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c2, cen, cin(cpw(c0), cfn)))
  -| wceq(c2, crab(s0, co(c2o, cmap, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cfsupp, emptycls)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c2, cen, cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wf1o(cmpt(hs0, c2, cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), csn(c1o))), c2, cin(cpw(c0), cfn)))
  pwfi2f1o(s0, hs0, c0, c1, cmpt(hs0, c2, cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), csn(c1o))), c2)
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, c2, cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), csn(c1o))))
  f1oen(cmpt(hs0, c2, cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), csn(c1o))), c2, cin(cpw(c0), cfn))
  rabex2(s0, c2, co(c2o, cmap, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cfsupp, emptycls))
  ovex(c2o, cmap, c0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2o, cmap, c0)
  diff.c2o.s(s0)
  diff.cmap.s(s0)
}

  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c2, cen, cin(cpw(c0), cfn)))

blocks.name: isnumbasgrplem1
blocks.content: A set which is equipollent to the base set of a definable Abelian group is the base set of some (relabeled) Abelian group. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isnumbasgrplem1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wbr(c1, cen, c2)), wcel(c1, cima(cbs, cabl)))

} = {
  sylan2b(wcel(c0, cabl), wbr(c1, cen, c2), wcel(c1, cima(cbs, cabl)), wex(hs0, wf1o(cv(hs0), c2, c1)))
  bitri(wbr(c1, cen, c2), wex(hs0, wf1o(cv(hs0), c2, c1)), wbr(c2, cen, c1))
  ensymb(c1, c2)
  bren(hs0, c2, c1)
  impcom(wcel(c0, cabl), wex(hs0, wf1o(cv(hs0), c2, c1)), wcel(c1, cima(cbs, cabl)))
  exlimiv(hs0, wf1o(cv(hs0), c2, c1), wi(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, cima(cbs, cabl))))
  ex(wf1o(cv(hs0), c2, c1), wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, cima(cbs, cabl)))
  eqeltrd(c1, cima(cbs, cabl), cfv(cbs, co(cv(hs0), cimas, c0)), wa(wf1o(cv(hs0), c2, c1), wcel(c0, cabl)))
  imasbas(c1, co(cv(hs0), cimas, c0), cv(hs0), c0, c2, cabl, wa(wf1o(cv(hs0), c2, c1), wcel(c0, cabl)))
  adantr(wf1o(cv(hs0), c2, c1), wcel(c0, cabl), wfo(cv(hs0), c2, c1))
  f1ofo(cv(hs0), c2, c1)
  syl(wa(wf1o(cv(hs0), c2, c1), wcel(c0, cabl)), wcel(cfv(cbs, co(cv(hs0), cimas, c0)), cima(cbs, cabl)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cimas, c0), cabl))
  mpbid(wa(wf1o(cv(hs0), c2, c1), wcel(c0, cabl)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cimas, c0), cabl), wcel(c0, cabl))
  simpr(wf1o(cv(hs0), c2, c1), wcel(c0, cabl))
  3syl(wa(wf1o(cv(hs0), c2, c1), wcel(c0, cabl)), wb(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cimas, c0), cabl)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cgim, co(cv(hs0), cimas, c0))), wbr(c0, cgic, co(cv(hs0), cimas, c0)))

  a1i(wa(wf1o(cv(hs0), c2, c1), wcel(c0, cabl)), wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  simpl(wf1o(cv(hs0), c2, c1), wcel(c0, cabl))

  gicabl(c0, co(cv(hs0), cimas, c0))

blocks.name: harn0
blocks.content: The Hartogs number of a set is never zero. _MOVABLE_ (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Jul-2015.)

blocks.name: numinfctb
blocks.content: A numerable infinite set contains a countable subset. _MOVABLE_ (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Jul-2015.)

blocks.name: isnumbasgrplem2
blocks.content: If the (to be thought of as disjoint, although the proof does not require this) union of a set and its Hartogs number supports a group structure (more generally, a cancellative magma), then the set must be numerable. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Jul-2015.)

  syl2anc(c0 ‚àà dom(card), (c0 ‚ãÉ(har ` c0))‚àà(Base " Abel), (c0 ‚ãÉ(har ` c0))‚àà dom(card), (c0 ‚ãÉ(har ` c0))‚â† ‚àÖ)
  mpan2(c0 ‚àà dom(card), (c0 ‚ãÉ(har ` c0))‚àà dom(card), (har ` c0)‚àà dom(card))
  ax-mp((har ` c0)‚àà dom(card), (har ` c0)‚àà On)
  harcl(c0)

  sylancr(c0 ‚àà dom(card), (c0 ‚ãÉ(har ` c0))‚â† ‚àÖ, (har ` c0)‚äÜ(c0 ‚ãÉ(har ` c0)), (har ` c0)‚â† ‚àÖ)

  syl((c0 ‚ãÉ(har ` c0))‚àà(Base " Abel), c0 ‚àà dom(card), (c0 ‚ãÉ(har ` c0))‚àà(Base " Grp))
  sseli((c0 ‚ãÉ(har ` c0)), (Base " Abel), (Base " Grp))
  ax-mp((Base " Abel)‚äÜ(Base " Grp), Abel ‚äÜ Grp)
  ssriv(hs0, cabl, cgrp)
  ablgrp(hs0)
  imass2(cabl, cgrp, cbs)

blocks.name: isnumbasgrp
blocks.content: A set is numerable iff it and its Hartogs number can be jointly given the structure of a group. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isnumbasgrp(class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wcel(cun(c0, cfv(char, c0)), cima(cbs, cgrp)))
} = {
  impbii(wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wcel(cun(c0, cfv(char, c0)), cima(cbs, cgrp)))
  sseldi(cun(c0, cfv(char, c0)), cima(cbs, cgrp), cima(cbs, cabl), wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)))
  ax-mp(wss(cima(cbs, cabl), cima(cbs, cgrp)), wss(cabl, cgrp))
  ssriv(hs0, cabl, cgrp)
  ablgrp(cv(hs0))
  imass2(cabl, cgrp, cbs)
  biimpi(wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wcel(cun(c0, cfv(char, c0)), cima(cbs, cabl)))
  isnumbasabl(c0)
  isnumbasgrplem2(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cabl)
  diff.hs0.c(cgrp)
}

blocks.name: dfacbasgrp
blocks.content: A choice equivalent in abstract algebra: All nonempty sets admit a group structure. From ~ http://mathoverflow.net/a/12988 . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfacbasgrp() {
  |- wb(wac, wceq(cima(cbs, cgrp), cdif(universe, csn(emptycls))))
} = {
  bitri(wac, wceq(cima(cbs, cgrp), cdif(universe, csn(emptycls))), wceq(cdm(ccrd), universe))
  dfac10()
  impbii(wceq(cdm(ccrd), universe), wceq(cima(cbs, cgrp), cdif(universe, csn(emptycls))))
  eqrdv(hs0, cima(cbs, cgrp), cdif(universe, csn(emptycls)), wceq(cdm(ccrd), universe))
  syl6bbr(wceq(cdm(ccrd), universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cbs, cgrp)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, csn(emptycls))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls)))
  impbida(wceq(cdm(ccrd), universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cbs, cgrp)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls)))
  jctil(wa(wceq(cdm(ccrd), universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cbs, cgrp))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  adantl(wceq(cdm(ccrd), universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cbs, cgrp)), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  sylbi(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cbs, cgrp)), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wrex(hs1, cgrp, wceq(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))))
  mp2an(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cbs, cgrp)), wrex(hs1, cgrp, wceq(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))), wfn(cbs, universe), wss(cgrp, universe))
  basfn()
  ssv(cgrp)
  fvelimab(hs1, cbs, universe, cgrp, cv(hs0))
  rexlimiv(hs1, cgrp, wceq(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  syl5ibcom(wcel(cv(hs1), cgrp), wceq(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wne(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), emptycls))
  grpbn0(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)))
  neeq1(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0), emptycls)
  sseldi(cv(hs0), cima(cbs, cgrp), cima(cbs, cabl), wa(wceq(cdm(ccrd), universe), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls))))
  ax-mp(wss(cima(cbs, cabl), cima(cbs, cgrp)), wss(cabl, cgrp))
  ssriv(hs0, cabl, cgrp)
  ablgrp(cv(hs0))
  imass2(cabl, cgrp, cbs)
  syl2anc(wa(wceq(cdm(ccrd), universe), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls))), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cbs, cabl)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(ccrd)), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  eleqtrrd(cv(hs0), cdm(ccrd), universe, wa(wceq(cdm(ccrd), universe), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls))))
  simprl(wceq(cdm(ccrd), universe), wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  simpl(wceq(cdm(ccrd), universe), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls)))
  simprr(wceq(cdm(ccrd), universe), wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  isnumbasgrplem3(cv(hs0))
  eldifsn(cv(hs0), universe, emptycls)
  eqrdv(hs0, cdm(ccrd), universe, wceq(cima(cbs, cgrp), cdif(universe, csn(emptycls))))
  2thd(wceq(cima(cbs, cgrp), cdif(universe, csn(emptycls))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(ccrd)), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  sylibr(wceq(cima(cbs, cgrp), cdif(universe, csn(emptycls))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(ccrd)), wcel(cun(cv(hs0), cfv(char, cv(hs0))), cima(cbs, cgrp)))
  eleqtrrd(cun(cv(hs0), cfv(char, cv(hs0))), cima(cbs, cgrp), cdif(universe, csn(emptycls)), wceq(cima(cbs, cgrp), cdif(universe, csn(emptycls))))
  a1i(wceq(cima(cbs, cgrp), cdif(universe, csn(emptycls))), wcel(cun(cv(hs0), cfv(char, cv(hs0))), cdif(universe, csn(emptycls))))
  mpbir2an(wcel(cun(cv(hs0), cfv(char, cv(hs0))), cdif(universe, csn(emptycls))), wcel(cun(cv(hs0), cfv(char, cv(hs0))), universe), wne(cun(cv(hs0), cfv(char, cv(hs0))), emptycls))
  unex(cv(hs0), cfv(char, cv(hs0)))
  fvex(char, cv(hs0))
  mp2an(wne(cun(cv(hs0), cfv(char, cv(hs0))), emptycls), wss(cfv(char, cv(hs0)), cun(cv(hs0), cfv(char, cv(hs0)))), wne(cfv(char, cv(hs0)), emptycls))
  ssun2(cfv(char, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0))
  ax-mp(wne(cfv(char, cv(hs0)), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  harn0(cv(hs0), universe)
  ssn0(cfv(char, cv(hs0)), cun(cv(hs0), cfv(char, cv(hs0))))
  eldifsn(cun(cv(hs0), cfv(char, cv(hs0))), universe, emptycls)
  id(wceq(cima(cbs, cgrp), cdif(universe, csn(emptycls))))
  isnumbasgrp(cv(hs0))
  a1i(wceq(cima(cbs, cgrp), cdif(universe, csn(emptycls))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(cima(cbs, cgrp))
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(universe, csn(emptycls)))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cdm(ccrd), universe))
  diff.hs1.c(cbs)
  diff.hs1.c(cgrp)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.w(wne(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  diff.hs0.c(cabl)
  diff.hs0.c(cgrp)
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(ccrd))
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cima(cbs, cgrp), cdif(universe, csn(emptycls))))
}
